title: Eh Moo Nah
author: Eh Moo Nah
content: What a Stressing Life it is when we are working just to reward ourselves with Money and buy Things that we need just to Survive. so if magical creature from a lamp is true and would give me 3 Wish, This will I say. 1. I wish to be Fluent and be good in all the language on Earth. (Computer Language, Human Language,) 2. I wish to be good in playing all the Music Instruments on Earth. 3. I wish to be the best Basketball Player and  not get injured even if I am not Famous.How about you? what is your wish?   ---------------------------------------------P.S. I Posted this here in Off Topic Section just to know what do you wish that you want to come true if What if. ( I am not a Magical Creature)P.P.S. please let me know if there is a Topic like this and post the link here so i can Delete this post for account safety purposes.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: I wish my family to Have complete good health and of course I wish  that Bitcoin will reach a Million dollar sooner as for sure , i will be richer more than x2

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well this was a game I did play when I was a kid. But it was just 1 wish and this 1 wish was for infinite wishes. It is cheating but if I had 3 wishes now I am older so it would be easier to make choices.I want enough money to take care of my family for until they are all not alive anymore. To be able to cure the most horrible deadliest diseases. Cancer, aids, dementia, and blindness and deaf for just some examples but all of them.Last wish something fun like able to fly. It would make me different then anyone in the world. I would want to have this special ability.

comments.author: hungsuchumanh1
comments.body: 1st wishI wish the road to success will not be far away

comments.author: Kspaakash330
comments.body: I wish i could be a perfect man who will come for everyone's dream of family
